testProject.title: Test Detective Story
testProject.description: A test project for automated testing
testProject.logline: A detective investigates a mysterious case

testScript.content:
FADE IN:

INT. POLICE STATION - DAY

Detective JOHN (30s) sits at his cluttered desk, examining his badge. The office buzzes with activity.

JOHN
(quietly)
Another day, another case.

He takes a sip of coffee and opens a file folder.

FADE OUT.
